name: Accelerated-Cplusplus
tagline: My repo for doing the exercises from book Accelerated C++
body:
### Welcome to my Accelerated C++ repo pages.
Here I will put all my solutions to exercises in the book Accelerated C++ as well as programs within individual chapters. This will help me to get experience and knowledge on programming.

#### Theory and exercises
In my repo for each chapter I divided the content into two different folders: theory and exercises to easily distinguish the programs during text from the exercises.

### Your support and contributions
Your support and help is welcome. Feel free to check my solutions possibly letting me know of the possible mistakes I did in my programs or on whatever could be done better.

### Authors and Contributors
You can mail me @ivan.kovac216@gmail.com or find my repo(@kovacivo) on GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
